name: Me and my worst eneME
description:
“Me and my worst eneME” is a bit cynical 3D Point and Click adventure where player can’t control their right arm called Matthew. The main character is an alien on an alien planet and has an alien Alien Hand Syndrome, which means that his left arm is a separate person, Matthew, with its own gender (male), desires, reasons,fears and inventory. 

Today will be the best day! After five years in a queue the alien gets an appointment in a hospital to cure his alien Alien Hand Syndrome. This morning the alien wakes up in his appartment with a right hand fastened with handcuffs. ..
